description:
Ian is a quiet guy. He says he likes to take everything in before he speaks:
"I like to figure out what's going on before I blurt out something stupid!"
He's 27, from the Pacific Northwest, and has been with his girlfriend for a few years now (funny thing — his girlfriend filmed him for his submission video!).
He loves outdoor activities, especially mountain biking.
He said he had played soccer as a kid, so we had do some moves in the park.
He actually isn't very good, which is pretty funny. Doesn't matter, though, because I could watch him read the phone book!
Fur lovers are going to be in heaven with Ian. He's got a furry chest and stomach, arms and legs, and a tight, hairy butt.
I'm glad we had him take a nice, hot shower so he could soap up all that hair!
title: Ian
